description: When hot laps and groomers are calling your name, this all-mountain First Tracks™ Bib is ready to rock wherever you ride. All the technical bells and whistles—seals out snow and wind, jacket-to-bib connector, and so forth—with a nod to the sportiness that keeps you pitching headlong into moguls then bombing down some breezy blues. Perfect for those who run cold and bold, not shying from kick turns and tricks, with the functionality to keep them out there from freshies to last lift.
name: Mountain Hardwear First Tracks Bib, Reg - Mens
